name: Synchrobox
description:
My entry for the GMTK game jam 2021.

You have 2 boxes which are "joined together" so you only can move if you move the 2 boxes at the same time and you only win if you reach the end at the same time.

Controls

You control the each box with each hand.

Purple box -> WASD

Green box -> arrows

Go back -> esc

Accept -> spacebar
